alert.note: Alert for Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 12:49AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Traverse, northwestern Big Stone, southern Roberts and northern Grant Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 149 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Summit, or near Wilmot, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wilmot around 155 AM CDT. Peever Flats Housing and Bonanza Grove around 200 AM CDT. Peever and Yankeetown around 205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Browns Valley, Beardsley, Traverse Country Park, Rainbow Island, Lake Traverse Housing Units and Lake Traverse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
